name: Pharmeasy
description: We help patients connect with local pharmacy stores and diagnostic centers to fulfill their extensive medical needs. We believe that everyone should have access to good health. Thus, through our services, we ensure you get access to the best and most genuine health products, with the highest savings in the shortest time possible.
features: Offer Lab test at your location
Wide range of product and services
Headline: Take it easy
ShortDescription: PharmEasy today is India’s leading and most trusted online healthcare aggregator in the country.
enhanced_description: Pharmeasy is India's leading and most trusted online healthcare aggregator, connecting patients with local pharmacy stores and diagnostic centers. It provides access to a wide range of genuine health products and services, aiming to offer the highest savings in the shortest time possible. As a health and safety provider under Total Rewards, Pharmeasy supports employee well-being by offering key services such as at-home lab tests and doctor consultations over a call, thereby helping organizations improve employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Providing employees with access to local pharmacy stores for medical needs
Connecting employees with diagnostic centers for various tests
Facilitating at-home lab test services for employees
Enabling doctor consultations over a call for employees
Offering a wide range of health products and services as an employee benefit
competitive_advantages: Positioned as India's leading and most trusted online healthcare aggregator
Offers highest savings on health products and services
Ensures fastest possible delivery/access to health services
Offers accessible doctor consultations via call
roi_benefits: Potential for highest savings on medical needs for employees
Improved employee happiness and engagement due to accessible health benefits
primary_users: Employees (as beneficiaries of the health services)
Patients (as direct users of pharmacy, diagnostic, and consultation services)
